attributes.additional_details:
Under the new act, also known as the Snoopers’ Charter, the Government and associated organisations will have free access to profile your internet usage. 

Please read this link for a full run down of the main points:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Oq-INw6NVji-_LlxfCTZ5Uoqtlb23VGps1TzG3B-2CI/edit?usp=sharing
attributes.background: The new Investigatory Powers Act (2016) that has just been passed encompasses many new regulations that destroy the privacy of both British citizens and British based businesses.
